SEARCH
Module com.example.finalassignment
Package Controller

Class studentController

java.lang.Object
Controller.studentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
studentControllerInterface
public class studentController extends Object implements studentControllerInterface
The studentController class implements the studentControllerInterface and serves as the controller in the MVC pattern for the Student Management.
